entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight then becoming light before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
